Description:
Detects successful logon from public IP address via SMB. This can indicate a publicly-exposed SMB port.

Author: Micah Babinski (@micahbabinski), Zach Mathis (@yamatosecurity)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: External Remote SMB Logon from Public IP
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where ((eventid = '4624' and logontype = '3') and  not ((ipaddress cidr '::1/128' or ipaddress cidr '10.0.0.0/8' or ipaddress cidr '127.0.0.0/8' or ipaddress cidr '172.16.0.0/12' or ipaddress cidr '192.168.0.0/16' or ipaddress cidr '169.254.0.0/16' or ipaddress cidr 'fc00::/7' or ipaddress cidr 'fe80::/10') or ipaddress = '-'))
